user.title: Set up Paw Control
user.description:
Welcome to Paw Control! Let's set up smart dog management for your Home Assistant.

This integration will help you track feeding, walks, health, and GPS location for your dogs.

data_description.name: Shown in Home Assistant under Devices & Services to identify this Paw Control setup.

add_dog.title: Add Dog
add_dog.description:
Configure your dog's basic information.

Dogs: {dog_count} configured

data_description.dog_id: Use a short lowercase identifier. It becomes part of the entity IDs created for this dog.
data_description.dog_name: Friendly display name used in dashboards and notifications.
data_description.dog_breed: Optional detail that improves nutrition and health recommendations.
data_description.dog_age: Provide the age in years so Paw Control can tailor activity and feeding guidance.
data_description.dog_weight: Used to calculate meal portions and health thresholds.
data_description.dog_size: Select the size profile that best matches your dog for defaults and summaries.

dog_modules.title: Enable Modules for {dog_name}
dog_modules.description:
Choose which modules to enable for {dog_name} ({dog_size}, {dog_age} years old).

Only selected modules will create entities for this dog.

data_description.enable_feeding: Creates feeding sensors, services, and reminders for this dog.
data_description.enable_walk: Tracks walk history and exposes walk-completion helpers.
data_description.enable_health: Adds health metrics, medication reminders, and vet schedule tracking.
data_description.enable_gps: Enables GPS tracking entities and geofencing options.
data_description.enable_notifications: Allows Paw Control to send Home Assistant notifications for this dog.
data_description.enable_dashboard: Automatically build a Lovelace dashboard tab for this dog's data.
data_description.enable_visitor: Provides quick toggles to manage visitor/guest safety automations.
data_description.enable_grooming: Adds grooming reminders to the helper schedule.
data_description.enable_medication: Creates helpers to manage medication dosing routines.
data_description.enable_training: Tracks training goals and exposes reminder services.
data_description.enable_weather: Surfaces weather-based health guidance for outdoor activities.
data_description.enable_garden: Adds garden-tracking automations for outdoor areas.

dog_gps.title: GPS Configuration for {dog_name}
dog_gps.description:
Configure GPS tracking settings for {dog_name}.

Select your preferred GPS source and adjust tracking parameters for optimal battery life and accuracy.

data_description.gps_source: Choose the hardware or service providing GPS updates for this dog.
data_description.gps_update_interval: How frequently to request new GPS data. Shorter intervals use more battery.
data_description.gps_accuracy_filter: Ignore updates less accurate than this distance in meters.
data_description.enable_geofencing: Turn on automatic alerts when the dog leaves safe zones.
data_description.home_zone_radius: Define the radius of the safe home zone used for geofencing alerts.

dog_feeding.title: Feeding Configuration for {dog_name}

data_description.meals_per_day: Number of meals Paw Control will plan for each day.
data_description.daily_food_amount: Total amount of food (in grams) to distribute across all meals.
data_description.food_type: Used to tailor nutritional advice and feeding reminders.
data_description.feeding_schedule: Choose the preset schedule or custom times for meals.
data_description.breakfast_enabled: Enable if this dog should receive a morning meal.
data_description.breakfast_time: Time of day to serve breakfast when enabled.
data_description.lunch_enabled: Enable if this dog should receive a midday meal.
data_description.lunch_time: Time of day to serve lunch when enabled.
data_description.dinner_enabled: Enable if this dog should receive an evening meal.
data_description.dinner_time: Time of day to serve dinner when enabled.
data_description.snacks_enabled: Track snacks separately from regular meals.
data_description.enable_reminders: Send Home Assistant reminders ahead of each scheduled meal.
data_description.reminder_minutes_before: How many minutes before a meal the reminder should trigger.

dog_health.title: Health & Diet Configuration for {dog_name}

data_description.vet_name: Primary veterinarian used in reminders and diagnostics.
data_description.vet_phone: Contact number displayed in emergency notifications.
data_description.last_vet_visit: Date of the most recent vet appointment for reference.
data_description.next_checkup: Schedule the next planned vet visit to receive reminders.
data_description.weight_tracking: Enable to log weight entries and show weight trend sensors.
data_description.health_aware_portions: Adjust feeding recommendations based on the health profile.
data_description.ideal_weight: Target weight (kg) used for goal tracking and alerts.
data_description.activity_level: Overall activity level to balance calorie suggestions.
data_description.weight_goal: Choose whether the dog should maintain, lose, or gain weight.
data_description.spayed_neutered: Indicate if the dog is spayed/neutered for health calculations.
data_description.has_diabetes: Enable diabetic care prompts and medication helpers.
data_description.has_heart_disease: Enable heart-health alerts and diet adjustments.
data_description.has_arthritis: Track joint-support reminders and activity guidance.
data_description.has_allergies: Enable allergy alerts and diet filters.
data_description.has_digestive_issues: Tailor feeding reminders for sensitive stomachs.
data_description.other_health_conditions: List any other conditions to surface in reminders.
data_description.prescription: Mark if the dog follows a prescription diet.
data_description.diabetic: Flag that the dog uses a diabetic diet plan.
data_description.kidney_support: Flag that the dog uses a kidney support diet plan.
data_description.low_fat: Flag that the dog uses a low-fat diet plan.
data_description.weight_control: Flag that the dog uses a weight-control diet plan.
data_description.sensitive_stomach: Flag that the dog uses a sensitive stomach formula.
data_description.senior_formula: Flag that the dog uses a senior-specific food.
data_description.puppy_formula: Flag that the dog uses a puppy-specific food.
data_description.grain_free: Flag that the dog uses a grain-free diet.
data_description.hypoallergenic: Flag that the dog uses a hypoallergenic formula.
data_description.organic: Flag that the dog uses organic food.
data_description.raw_diet: Flag that the dog follows a raw/BARF diet.
data_description.dental_care: Flag that the dog uses a dental-care food.
data_description.joint_support: Flag that the dog uses a joint-support formula.
data_description.rabies_vaccination: Record the date of the last rabies vaccination.
data_description.rabies_next: Date the next rabies vaccination is due.
data_description.dhpp_vaccination: Record the date of the last DHPP vaccination.
data_description.dhpp_next: Date the next DHPP vaccination is due.
data_description.bordetella_vaccination: Record the date of the last Bordetella vaccination.
data_description.bordetella_next: Date the next Bordetella vaccination is due.
data_description.medication_1_name: Name of the first medication you want to track.
data_description.medication_1_dosage: Dosage instructions for the first medication.
data_description.medication_1_frequency: How often the first medication should be given.
data_description.medication_1_time: Default time to administer the first medication.
data_description.medication_1_with_meals: Indicate if the first medication should be taken with food.
data_description.medication_1_notes: Additional notes for the first medication.
data_description.medication_2_name: Name of the second medication you want to track.
data_description.medication_2_dosage: Dosage instructions for the second medication.
data_description.medication_2_frequency: How often the second medication should be given.
data_description.medication_2_time: Default time to administer the second medication.
data_description.medication_2_with_meals: Indicate if the second medication should be taken with food.
data_description.medication_2_notes: Additional notes for the second medication.

discovery_confirm.title: Confirm Discovered Device

data_description.confirm: Enable to prefill the wizard with the discovered device details. Disable if you want to ignore this discovery.

data_description.add_another: Choose this to return to the dog form and configure an additional pet. Leave unchecked to move on to profile selection.

entity_profile.title: Select Entity Profile

data_description.entity_profile: Determines which sensors, helpers, and automations Paw Control will create. Pick the profile that matches the number of dogs and modules you enabled.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Paw Control

data_description.confirm: Confirm to refresh credentials and run the health checks noted above.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Paw Control

data_description.entity_profile: Select a new profile to adjust which entities Paw Control keeps active for this configuration.

data_description.add_another: Enable to add one more dog before moving on. Disable to continue with global settings.

configure_modules.title: Global Settings

data_description.performance_mode: Select how resource-intensive Paw Control should be for this installation. Defaults to balanced and automatically normalises legacy "standard" entries.
data_description.enable_analytics: Collect anonymous trend data to power overview widgets and reports.
data_description.enable_cloud_backup: Upload Paw Control configuration and history to your configured cloud target.
data_description.data_retention_days: Number of days to keep historical metrics before pruning old entries.
data_description.debug_logging: Enable verbose logging to help troubleshoot issues during setup.

configure_dashboard.title: Configure Dashboard
configure_dashboard.description:
Set up dashboard settings for {dog_count} dogs.

{dashboard_info}

data_description.auto_create_dashboard: Automatically build a Lovelace view with recommended cards.
data_description.create_per_dog_dashboards: Create separate dashboard tabs for each dog when multiple pets exist.
data_description.dashboard_theme: Pick which visual theme Paw Control should apply to generated views.
data_description.dashboard_template: Decide which layout template Paw Control should start from.
data_description.dashboard_mode: Control how detailed or compact the generated dashboard should be.
data_description.show_statistics: Include charts that summarise historical trends and KPIs.
data_description.show_maps: Add GPS map cards for dogs that provide location data.
data_description.show_health_charts: Show health dashboards for weight, medication and vet visits.
data_description.show_feeding_schedule: Display the shared feeding calendar with upcoming meals.
data_description.show_alerts: Add an alert panel that highlights outstanding issues.
data_description.compact_mode: Tighten spacing so the dashboard fits small screens more comfortably.
data_description.auto_refresh: Keep the dashboard updated without manual refresh actions.
data_description.refresh_interval: Interval, in seconds, used for automatic dashboard refreshes.

configure_external_entities.title: Configure External Entities
configure_external_entities.description:
üîó **External Entity Configuration**

Paw Control needs to connect to existing Home Assistant entities for full functionality. This step is required for Platinum quality alignment.

**Required for GPS tracking:** Device tracker or Person entity
**Optional for visitor detection:** Door sensor
**Optional for notifications:** Custom notification service
**Optional for weather health:** Weather entity

‚ö†Ô∏è If no entities are available, you can configure them manually later.

data_description.gps_source: Choose which device tracker or person entity Paw Control should use for GPS.
data_description.door_sensor: Optional door sensor that triggers visitor or garden automations.
data_description.notify_fallback: Optional notification service used when direct device notifications fail.

final_setup.title: Complete Setup

error.dog_id_already_exists: A dog with this ID already exists
error.invalid_dog_name_length: Dog name must be between 2 and 30 characters
error.dog_name_already_exists: A dog with this name already exists
error.dog_id_too_short: Dog ID must be at least 2 characters long
error.dog_id_too_long: Dog ID cannot be longer than 30 characters
error.invalid_dog_id_format: Dog ID must start with a letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores
error.invalid_weight_format: Weight must be a valid number
error.weight_out_of_range: Weight must be between 0.5 and 200 kg
error.weight_size_mismatch: Weight doesn't match the selected size category
error.invalid_age_format: Age must be a valid number
error.age_out_of_range: Age must be between 0 and 30 years
error.no_dogs_configured: At least one dog must be configured
error.setup_failed: Setup failed due to configuration error
error.gps_entity_not_found: The selected GPS source entity was not found
error.gps_entity_unavailable: The selected GPS source entity is currently unavailable
error.door_sensor_not_found: The selected door sensor entity was not found
error.door_sensor_update_failed: Unable to save the door sensor configuration
error.notification_service_not_found: The selected notification service was not found
error.invalid_notification_service: The notification service format is invalid
error.invalid_profile: You need to select a valid profile
error.profile_unchanged: You're already using this profile. Choose a different profile to continue.
error.weather_entity_not_found: The selected weather entity was not found
error.weather_entity_unavailable: The selected weather entity is currently unavailable

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Paw Control is allowed

manage_dogs.title: Manage Dogs

gps_settings.title: GPS & Tracking Settings
gps_settings.description: Configure GPS tracking parameters for optimal performance and battery life.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Configure how and when you receive notifications about your dogs.

health_settings.title: Health Settings
health_settings.description: Configure health monitoring and vet reminders.

system_settings.title: System Settings
system_settings.description: Configure system-wide settings and performance options.

data_description.reset_time: Choose when Paw Control performs daily maintenance tasks.
data_description.performance_mode: Select how aggressively Paw Control refreshes data and schedules jobs.
data_description.data_retention_days: How long Paw Control keeps historical metrics before pruning.
data_description.auto_backup: Schedule local exports before retention cleanup runs.
data_description.enable_analytics: Aggregate anonymous trends across all dogs to power summary widgets.
data_description.enable_cloud_backup: Upload configuration snapshots to your configured cloud target.
data_description.resilience_skip_threshold: Number of skipped guard executions before the escalation script raises an alert (0 disables guard escalations).
data_description.resilience_breaker_threshold: Open or half-open breaker count that triggers escalation follow-ups (0 disables breaker escalations).
data_description.manual_check_event: Event type that triggers an on-demand resilience check. Leave blank to disable manual checks. Known values: {manual_check_event_options}.
data_description.manual_guard_event: Event type that triggers guard follow-up actions on demand. Leave blank to disable manual guard escalations. Known values: {manual_guard_event_options}.
data_description.manual_breaker_event: Event type that triggers breaker follow-up actions on demand. Leave blank to disable manual breaker escalations. Known values: {manual_breaker_event_options}.

weather_settings.title: Weather Health Settings
weather_settings.description: Configure weather-based health alerts and recommendations for your dogs.

error.dog_id_already_exists: A dog with this ID already exists
error.invalid_dog_name_length: Dog name must be between 2 and 30 characters
error.invalid_api_endpoint: API endpoint must be a valid http or https URL
error.invalid_payload: Import payload could not be validated
error.payload_not_mapping: Import payload must be a JSON object
error.unsupported_version: This export file was created with an unsupported version
error.options_missing: Import payload is missing configuration options
error.dogs_invalid: Import payload must include a list of dogs
error.dog_invalid: Each imported dog entry must be a JSON object
error.dog_missing_id: Each imported dog must include a unique ID
error.dog_invalid_modules: Dog module settings could not be interpreted
error.dog_duplicate: Duplicate dog IDs detected in the import file
error.runtime_cache_unavailable: Runtime data is temporarily unavailable. Please retry after the integration reloads.

feed_dog.description: Log a feeding event for a dog

end_walk.description: End the current walk for a dog

gps_start_walk.name: GPS Start Walk
gps_start_walk.description: Start a GPS-tracked walk for a dog

log_health_data.name: Log Health Data
log_health_data.description: Log health data for a dog

log_medication.name: Log Medication
log_medication.description: Log medication given to a dog

start_grooming.name: Start Grooming
start_grooming.description: Start a grooming session for a dog

notify_test.name: Test Notification
notify_test.description: Send a test notification for a dog

acknowledge_notification.name: Acknowledge notification
acknowledge_notification.description: Mark a PawControl notification as acknowledged

daily_reset.name: Daily Reset
daily_reset.description: Perform daily reset of counters for all dogs

update_weather_data.name: Update Weather Data
update_weather_data.description: Updates weather data for health monitoring

get_weather_recommendations.name: Get Weather Recommendations
get_weather_recommendations.description: Retrieves personalized weather recommendations for a dog

setup_automatic_gps.name: Setup Automatic GPS
setup_automatic_gps.description: Sets up automatic GPS tracking with safety zones

recalculate_health_portions.name: Recalculate Health Portions
recalculate_health_portions.description: Recalculates food portions based on current health data

adjust_calories_for_activity.name: Adjust Calories for Activity
adjust_calories_for_activity.description: Adjusts calorie intake based on activity level

activate_diabetic_feeding_mode.name: Activate Diabetic Feeding Mode
activate_diabetic_feeding_mode.description: Activates special feeding schedule for diabetic dogs

feed_with_medication.name: Feed with Medication
feed_with_medication.description: Logs a feeding along with medication administration

generate_weekly_health_report.name: Generate Weekly Health Report
generate_weekly_health_report.description: Generates a comprehensive weekly health report

activate_emergency_feeding_mode.name: Activate Emergency Feeding Mode
activate_emergency_feeding_mode.description: Activates emergency feeding schedule for sick or injured dogs

start_diet_transition.name: Start Diet Transition
start_diet_transition.description: Starts gradual transition to new food

log_poop.name: Log Poop
log_poop.description: Logs bowel movement information for health monitoring

missing_dog_configuration.title: Add at least one dog
missing_dog_configuration.description: Paw Control needs at least one dog profile. Configure a dog to continue. Dogs configured: {dogs_count}.

duplicate_dog_ids.title: Duplicate dog IDs detected
duplicate_dog_ids.description: The following IDs are used more than once: {duplicate_ids}. Each of the {total_dogs} dogs must have a unique ID.

invalid_dog_data.title: Incomplete dog details
invalid_dog_data.description: Some dogs are missing required information: {invalid_dogs}. Provide a name and ID for each of the {total_dogs} dogs.

door_sensor_persistence_failure.title: Door sensor settings could not be saved
door_sensor_persistence_failure.description: Paw Control could not persist the door sensor configuration for {dog_name} ({dog_id}). Sensor: {door_sensor}. Error: {error}. Last attempt: {timestamp}.

invalid_gps_configuration.title: GPS source missing
invalid_gps_configuration.description: GPS tracking is enabled for {gps_enabled_dogs} dog(s), but no GPS source is selected. Choose a GPS source in the options.

missing_notification_config.title: Notification service unavailable
missing_notification_config.description: The {missing_service} notification service is not available. {notification_enabled_dogs} dog(s) rely on this service.

outdated_configuration.title: Update the configuration entry
outdated_configuration.description: The configuration entry uses version {current_version}. Update it to version {required_version} through the options flow.

performance_warning.title: Performance tuning recommended
performance_warning.description: You configured {dog_count} dogs, which may affect performance. The recommended maximum is {recommended_max}.

gps_update_interval_warning.title: GPS updates are too frequent
gps_update_interval_warning.description: The GPS update interval is {current_interval} seconds. Increase it to at least {recommended_interval} seconds to reduce load.

storage_warning.title: Storage retention is too long
storage_warning.description: Data retention is set to {current_retention} days. Reduce it to {recommended_max} days to keep the database lean.

module_configuration_conflict.title: Too many intensive modules enabled
module_configuration_conflict.description: {intensive_dogs} dog(s) use all intensive modules out of {total_dogs} configured. Disable some modules or enable performance mode.

coordinator_error.title: Coordinator is unavailable
coordinator_error.description: Paw Control could not access its coordinator ({error}). Follow the suggested action or reload the integration.

reconfigure_warnings.title: Profile change produced warnings
reconfigure_warnings.description: The last reconfigure at {timestamp} switched from {previous_profile} to {requested_profile}. Compatibility warnings: {warnings}.

reconfigure_health.title: Health issues after reconfigure
reconfigure_health.description: The last reconfigure at {timestamp} for profile {requested_profile} reported issues: {health_issues}. Additional warnings: {health_warnings}.

feeding_compliance_alert.title: Feeding compliance issues for {dog_name}
feeding_compliance_alert.description: The latest feeding compliance check covering {days_to_check} days scored {compliance_score}% with {issue_count} issue(s) and {missed_meal_count} missed meal(s). Key findings: {issue_summary}. Missed meals: {missed_meal_summary}. Next steps: {recommendations_summary}. Checked at {checked_at}.

feeding_compliance_no_data.title: Feeding telemetry missing for {dog_name}
feeding_compliance_no_data.description: The latest feeding compliance check covering {days_to_check} days could not generate a report: {message}.

common.setup_flags_panel_description: Analytics, backup, and debug logging toggles captured during onboarding and options flows.
common.setup_flags_panel_source_config_entry: Valeurs par d√©faut de l'entr√©e de configuration
